hero.title: Premium Legal Services
hero.subtitle: Connect with Quebec's most qualified attorneys through our AI-powered matching platform. Get expert legal advice with complete transparency and trust.

features.title: Advanced Legal Technology
features.subtitle: Experience the future of legal services with our cutting-edge platform designed for both clients and attorneys.

ai.title: AI-Powered Matching
ai.description: Our advanced algorithm analyzes your legal needs, location, budget, and preferences to connect you with the perfect attorney.

security.title: Bank-Level Security
security.description: End-to-end encryption, secure document sharing, and compliance with all Canadian privacy regulations protect your sensitive information.

speed.title: Instant Connections
speed.description: Get matched with qualified attorneys in minutes, not days. Schedule consultations and start working on your case immediately.

network.title: Verified Network
network.description: All attorneys are verified with the Barreau du Québec and undergo comprehensive background checks and performance reviews.

documents.title: Smart Document Management
documents.description: Upload, share, and manage all your legal documents securely with version control and real-time collaboration features.

consultation.title: Video Consultations
consultation.description: Meet with your attorney face-to-face through our secure video platform, available 24/7 from anywhere in Quebec.

trust.title: Trusted by Legal Professionals Across Quebec
trust.subtitle: Our platform meets the highest standards of security, compliance, and professional excellence.

certifications.title: Certifications & Compliance
certifications.subtitle: Meeting the highest professional and security standards
certifications.quebecDesc: Approved by the Barreau du Québec for attorney referral services
certifications.complianceDesc: Full GDPR and PIPEDA compliance for data protection

guarantee.title: 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
guarantee.description: If you're not completely satisfied with our service, we'll make it right or provide a full refund.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients
testimonials.subtitle: Discover why thousands of Quebecers trust Judge.ca for their legal needs.

client1.content: Judge.ca helped me find the perfect corporate attorney for my startup. The matching process was incredibly accurate, and I was connected with someone who truly understood my industry within hours.
client1.highlight: Found the perfect attorney in hours, not weeks

client2.content: Going through a divorce was stressful enough, but Judge.ca made finding legal help simple and transparent. My attorney was professional, compassionate, and got me the results I needed.
client2.highlight: Professional, transparent, and effective legal help

client3.content: The immigration process seemed overwhelming until I found my attorney through Judge.ca. The platform made it easy to compare lawyers and find someone with exactly the expertise I needed.
client3.highlight: Made complex immigration law simple to navigate

attorney1.content: Judge.ca has transformed my practice. The quality of client matches is exceptional, and the platform's tools help me serve my clients more effectively than ever before.

attorney2.content: The referral quality from Judge.ca is outstanding. I only receive clients who are genuinely good fits for my practice, which means better outcomes for everyone involved.
